text: Kim Chwa-chin(hangul:김좌진, 金佐鎭, November 24 1889 - January 24 1930) was one of politician, reform activists and independent activists of Korea. nickname was Baikya (백야, 白冶) also Chinese style name was Myungyeo (명여, 明汝). == References == * http://100.daum.net/encyclopedia/view.do?docid=b03g1946b * http://terms.naver.com/entry.nhn?docId=1073114&mobile;&categoryId;=200001081 * http://navercast.naver.com/contents.nhn?contents_id=3887 Category:1889 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Anti-communists Category:Terrorists Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean murder victims Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Kim Chwa-chin
